ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: With all due respect lads, I thought this was a SMITHIN message chain?  As I is sure ye has all noticed, we gets tons o redundant messages on smithin alone
ygData.messageBody:
With all due respect lads, I thought this was a SMITHIN message chain? As I
is sure ye has all noticed, we gets tons o redundant messages on smithin
alone without gettin um on spoilers and quests too.

Storm MoradinSon
Old Mithril-bones

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, June 12, 1999 12:37 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Crude Stein


>From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
>
>>You get it from an Ogre Warrior quest. You have to bring a Noble Crest
>>from one of the hunters in Innothule to the guildmaster.
>>
>>-Patrick
>Can you give more specifics (I assume that you get it from the ogre cities
>warrior guild and where/what hunter Noble Crest from whom)? If this leads
me
>to get a stein and we're on the same server, will pay you a hefty amount of
>PP for your time and help. Tks.
>
